colorScale.legendDescription: Does law mandate paid or unpaid maternity leave?

note: To compare countries, it is assumed that parents reside in the main business city and that they work in retail. This is sometimes representative of other sectors and regions, while sometimes it is not.
title: Days of paid leave for childbirth and early childcare for the father
subtitle: Includes leave designated for childbirth and early childcare, as well as leave that can be shared between parents.
